title: Drawing, "Design for Citibank logo and nameplate", ca. 1975
medium: Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marker, center: Citibank/CITIBANK.
description: Two renderings of  Citibank logotype alongside Citibank logo. Each design uses  sans-serif font for Citibank logotype. Upper design uses lowercase letters following "C," lower design rendered in caps.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Citibank logo and nameplate", ca. 1975.
ca. 1975. Graphite and black marker on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-24.
